values:
From the bottom of our very full hearts, we want to thank everyone who came out last night, bought our CD, laughed at our jokes, and generally made us feel very squishy and amazing inside last night.  It was a wonderful, wonderful night.

You are quite possibly the best friends and fans the world has ever known.  We love you.

To everyone who was not able to make it out, the CD will be available for purchase on our website in the next few days - so its not too late to grab your copy.  I am exhausted today (and a little hung over!), so I am not making this a link, but MC website is at www.missile-command.net. 

Thanks again.  Oh, and if you got a CD - let it play for a little while after the last song.  Just sayin'.  ;)

For every physical copy of our debut CD "Machines Should Think, People Should Work" sold, Missile Command will donate $1 to legal defense funds that are fighting to ensure that marriage becomes a universal right for all consenting adults - regardless of race, creed, color or sexual preference. We are finally releasing CDs and they will be available for sale at the show tomorrow night! To any and all of you who enjoy Missile Command, this is THE SHOW to come to! We will have CD's, T-shirts, new songs and its a FREE SHOW. This is a very important show for us - we hope to see you all there!

For every physical copy of "Machines Should Think People Should Work" sold, Missile Command will donate $1 to legal defense funds that are fighting to insure that marriage becomes a universal right for all consenting adults, regardless of race, creed, color, or sexual preference.

This is a free show, there will finally be Full-length MC CDs to buy, and there is going to be an amazing lineup.  You do not want to miss this show!  :D

New Missile Command video now up on YouTube - LOLOLOLZ.

<lj-embed id="3"/>

Hey, for those of you in the Cleveland area that thought about Convergence but thought you couldn't get a decent airfare to Tampa - Airtran is running a sale if you buy by June 3rd:

<big>$99 each way</big>

Just go to their website and click on the Specials tab, then click Akron/Canton and you'll see the Tampa rate.

They are running a lot of specials to/from all over the place - check it out.  It may make Convergence a more reasonable goal for some of you that want to go, but have held off because of crappy airline fares.

YES, MISSILE COMMAND IS PLAYING C14 IN TAMPA - let there be rejoicing. :D If you have the means to go, you should - because we are playing, and there will be other cool bands and some wonderful DJs *coughBATTYcough* AND because there will be some interaction between and a shark that promises to be very Happy Days. That's all I'm saying. For information on Convergence (in case you aren't in the know about what it actually is), go here: The Festival and then go here for info for C14. My dad is coming down from Tallahassee to see our performance - I'm so stoked!! :D
We are debuting a completely new song and at the end of the concert there will be CAKE. ok - the cake is a lie. Yay.

I am clipping the friends list down.  Either I don't read you, you don't write any more, or I just don't care enough about all of your "drama" to read about it anymore.  If I've offended, I guess I've offended.

That's all.
This is a Friends Only Journal 'cause... If you wish to be added, post here and I will evaluate your girliness. Thank you.
